conversations.body_text: Hi Cameron Daw,  Hello, this was a previous promotion and is no longer valid. Please use other coupons to purchase.

Yous still have have the $45 off deal showing,

On Mon, 22 Dec 2025, 10:41 pm service@simsonn.com,
ID 号为 8851 和 9446 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单8851  
      主题:   
      描述:  You have an ad on facebook saying $45 off order (BLACK45) it doesn't work. I would like to order a set of pedals but at it stand they are almost $500 alone, really pushing my budget. If there is a way for you to get this to work can you let me know please

合并来自工单9446  
      主题:   
      描述:  Hey I just ordered a set of pedals and my phone automatically put in my old address that's over 400kms away, can I please change the address from 65 Dewhurst Street werris creek 2341 to 6 Rosemount Dr, Catherine Field NSW 2557, Australia or cancel order to reorder?

Hi Cameron Daw,    Your order has been shipped. We have urgently intercepted and modified the delivery address for you. Please confirm your information.  Cameron Daw 6 Rosemount Drive Catherine Field NSW 2557 Australia +61 475 608 592

Yes the address is correct

On Wed, 31 Dec 2025, 2:22 pm service@simsonn.com,
Hi Cameron Daw,    Alright, thank you for your confirmation.

I'm glad yous responded, was stressing, thank you.

On Wed, 31 Dec 2025, 5:46 pm service@simsonn.com,

When yous changed my address you didn't change my address for both things
sent, one is going 400 KMs away from where I live with no way to get them



On Wed, 31 Dec 2025, 8:47 pm service@simsonn.com,
Hi Cameron Daw,    Sorry, we updated the correct address when we reshipped your order. Did the carrier deliver to the wrong address?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047211077470

The delivered one of the boxes to the wrong adress

On Thu, 15 Jan 2026, 9:21 pm service@simsonn.com,

Hi Cameron Daw,     There is an issue with the display of this tracking number. The final-mile delivery address shown is correct. Please verify.  Tracking URL: http://pflogistics.com.au/contact  PFL TEL: +61 2 9746 9997  Logistics Tracking Number: NEXAU1030733734YQ

Just took this screen shot, the rumble motors have been sent to werris
creek. There's nothing we can do now, I will just have to deal with not
having them


On Fri, 16 Jan 2026, 10:44 pm service@simsonn.com,

Hi Cameron Daw,    Do you have any family members or friends who can pick up the package for you?  If not, please click the link to pay $15, and we will reship the order for you.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1
